body:
# Kalypto jQuery plugin ## Created & copyright (c) by Mike Behnke [local-pc-guy.com](http://www.local-pc-guy.com) Twitter: [@LocalPCGuy](http://twitter.com/localpcguy) **Description:** Basic plugin to use a sprite and CSS in place of a checkbox or radio button. Styles for the checked/non-checked state should be defined in a stylesheet, and the plugin changes the class and maintains the state of the checkbox or radio button.



**usage:** `$("input[name=rDemo]").kalypto(); $("#checkboxDemo").kalypto();` **Events:** (bound on the input) ` k_checked: when an element is checked` ` k_unchecked: when an element is checked` **options/defaults:** `{ toggleClass: "toggle", checkedClass: "checked", hideInputs: true }` [View Kalypto on GitHub](https://github.com/localpcguy/Kalypto) [Released under MIT License](http://lpg.mit-license.org/)
tagline: Replaces Radio Buttons or Checkbox elements with graphical version(s)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Kalyto
